definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="275" y="95"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">gamerule keepInventory true</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">weather clear</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">gamerule doWeathercycle false</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">time set 6000</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">gamerule doDaylightcycle false</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">设置成功</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
